title: I can't post in other Boards / Comment?
body:
I'm lv 13 and can't comment or post on any other boards, other than this one.. Why? QWQ
(It says I have to be lv 7 or higher, but I'm lv 13)

replies.body: As you've posted since this, it looks like you already know, but your boards level doesn't update until you create a post.
General posting. I want to be able to post on the boards and I'm level 27. Should be able to after this. Correct?
